subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The latest skirmish in the storied rivalry between the Yankees and the Red Sox was a verbal tussle on between Yankees’ Manager Joe Girardi and Tim Bogar, Boston’s first base coach.
snippet: The latest skirmish in the storied rivalry between the Yankees and the Red Sox was a verbal tussle on between Yankees’ Manager Joe Girardi and Tim Bogar, Boston’s first base coach.
